com.invoices.service

Class CurrencyRatesService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.invoices.service.CurrencyRatesService

  • public class CurrencyRatesService
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is annotated as a service. It is the service bean for the CurrencyRate entity It uses java's Currency and Money API for fetching exchange rates through http requests.
    Author:
    psoutzis

    • Constructor Detail

    • Method Detail

      • generateExchangeRate

        public CurrencyRates generateExchangeRate(Currency from,
                                          Currency to,
                                          CurrencyRates currencyRates,
                                          java.lang.Float rate)
        If CurrencyRates id is null, a new record will be saved to database.
        Parameters:
        from - The currency to convert from
        to - The currency to convert to
        currencyRates - The CurrencyRates object to use its mutators and finally return.
        rate - The exchange rate to save to CurrencyRates object. If this is null, exchange rate is automatically generated, using getExchangeRateFor(from, to) method.
        Returns:
        The initialized CurrencyRates record, that is now stored in the database.

      • setBaseAndTarget

        private void setBaseAndTarget(Currency from,
                              Currency to,
                              CurrencyRates currencyRates)
        Method will take a parameter CurrencyRates and add a Currency 'From' and a Currency 'To'
        Parameters:
        from - the Currency object to save to the CurrencyRates object. (Currency to convert from)
        to - the Currency object to save to the CurrencyRates object. (Currency to convert to)
        currencyRates - the CurrencyRates object to modify

      • setCurrentRate

        private void setCurrentRate(CurrencyRates currencyRates)
        This method will be called whenever the exchange rate between two currencies (Base and Target) needs to be added or updated. The exchange rate generated, is added to the passed CurrencyRates object.
        Parameters:
        currencyRates - the object to store the exchange rate at.

      • getExchangeRateFor

        private java.lang.Float getExchangeRateFor(java.lang.String baseCurrency,
                                           java.lang.String targetCurrency)
        Method will delegate requests to a chain of Exchange providers, until a satisfactory result is received
        Parameters:
        baseCurrency - The currency to convert from
        targetCurrency - The currency to convert to
        Returns:
        a float value of the current exchange rate of given base and target

      • save

        private void save(CurrencyRates currencyRates)
        Method will insert a CurrencyRates object to the database
        Parameters:
        currencyRates - The CurrencyRates object to save
